title: Pensions minister: for reckless bosses who put your nest eggs at risk, there will be no place to hide
text:
Seven years ago, the nation was facing a generational crisis in saving the number of people saving into a private pension was in freefall. Fast forward to today, and we have record numbers saving and planning for their future.

That sort of transformation doesn’t happen by accident – it’s the direct result of this Government’s pioneering pensions policies. With policies like auto-enrolment, we’ve transformed retirement saving, and turned around attitudes towards it.

But we are not stopping there. The Pension Schemes Bill unveiled in yesterday’s Queen’s Speech shows how we will ensure there’s no hiding place for reckless bosses who put retirement incomes at risk, and bring pensions into the digital...
